slokas: श्रीभगवानुवाचभूय एव महाबाहो श‍ृणु मे परमं वच: ।यत्तेऽहं प्रीयमाणाय वक्ष्यामि हितकाम्यया ॥ १ ॥
slokas(no number): The Supreme Personality of Godhead said: O mighty-armed one, please hear from me the supreme words of the Supreme Personality of Godhead. For the sake of my beloved, I shall now speak to you.  ॥
slokas_english: The Supreme Personality of Godhead said: O mighty-armed one, please hear from me the supreme words of the Supreme Personality of Godhead. For the sake of my beloved, I shall now speak to you. 1 ॥

slokas: न मे विदु: सुरगणा: प्रभवं न महर्षय: ।अहमादिर्हि देवानां महर्षीणां च सर्वश: ॥ २ ॥
slokas(no number): I do not know the origin of the demigods, nor the great sages, for I am the origin of all the demigods and the great sages.  ॥
slokas_english: I do not know the origin of the demigods, nor the great sages, for I am the origin of all the demigods and the great sages. 2 ॥

slokas: यो मामजमनादिं च वेत्ति लोकमहेश्वरम् ।असम्मूढ: स मर्त्येषु सर्वपापै: प्रमुच्यते ॥ ३ ॥
slokas(no number): He who knows Me as the origin of the universe and the Supreme Personality of Godhead, who is not deluded by the Supreme Personality of Godhead, is freed from all sins.  ॥
slokas_english: He who knows Me as the origin of the universe and the Supreme Personality of Godhead, who is not deluded by the Supreme Personality of Godhead, is freed from all sins. 3 ॥

slokas: बुद्धिर्ज्ञानमसम्मोह: क्षमा सत्यं दम: शम: ।सुखं दु:खं भवोऽभावो भयं चाभयमेव च ॥ ४ ॥
slokas(no number): Intelligence, knowledge, non-delusion, forgiveness, truthfulness, restraint, happiness, pain, birth, fear and fearlessness.
slokas_english: Intelligence, knowledge, non-delusion, forgiveness, truthfulness, restraint, happiness, pain, birth, fear and fearlessness. 4 Non-violence, equality, contentment, austerity, charity, fame and dishonor are the modes of nature of all living entities. 5 ॥

slokas: अहिंसा समता तुष्टिस्तपो दानं यशोऽयश: ।भवन्ति भावा भूतानां मत्त एव पृथग्विधा: ॥ ५ ॥
slokas(no number): Non-violence, equality, contentment, austerity, charity, fame and dishonor are the modes of nature of all living entities.

slokas: महर्षय: सप्‍त पूर्वे चत्वारो मनवस्तथा ।मद्भ‍ावा मानसा जाता येषां लोक इमा: प्रजा: ॥ ६ ॥
slokas(no number): In the past, the seven Manus, the four Manus, the sons of Me, whose minds were born of Me.  ॥
slokas_english: In the past, the seven Manus, the four Manus, the sons of Me, whose minds were born of Me. 6 ॥

slokas: एतां विभूतिं योगं च मम यो वेत्ति तत्त्वत: ।सोऽविकल्पेन योगेन युज्यते नात्र संशय: ॥ ७ ॥
slokas(no number): There is no doubt that one who knows this opulence and mysticism of yoga in truth is absorbed in yoga.  ॥
slokas_english: There is no doubt that one who knows this opulence and mysticism of yoga in truth is absorbed in yoga. 7 ॥

slokas: अहं सर्वस्य प्रभवो मत्त: सर्वं प्रवर्तते ।इति मत्वा भजन्ते मां बुधा भावसमन्विता: ॥ ८ ॥
slokas(no number): I am the source of all living entities, thinking that I am the source of all things.  ॥
slokas_english: I am the source of all living entities, thinking that I am the source of all things. 8 ॥

slokas: मच्च‍ित्ता मद्ग‍तप्राणा बोधयन्त: परस्परम् ।कथयन्तश्च मां नित्यं तुष्यन्ति च रमन्ति च ॥ ९ ॥
slokas(no number): They are always satisfied and delighted in my life and rejoice in my life and rejoice in my life. .
slokas_english: They are always satisfied and delighted in my life and rejoice in my life and rejoice in my life. 9.

slokas: तेषां सततयुक्तानां भजतां प्रीतिपूर्वकम् ।ददामि बुद्धियोगं तं येन मामुपयान्ति ते ॥ १० ॥
slokas(no number): Those who are constantly steadfast and who are always engaged in devotional service to those who worship Me are the means by which they attain Me. .
slokas_english: Those who are constantly steadfast and who are always engaged in devotional service to those who worship Me are the means by which they attain Me. 10.

slokas: तेषामेवानुकम्पार्थमहमज्ञानजं तम: ।नाशयाम्यात्मभावस्थो ज्ञानदीपेन भास्वता ॥ ११ ॥
slokas(no number): For the sake of compassion, I destroy the darkness of ignorance, and I destroy the illusory energy of knowledge. .
slokas_english: For the sake of compassion, I destroy the darkness of ignorance, and I destroy the illusory energy of knowledge. 11.

slokas: अर्जुन उवाचपरं ब्रह्म परं धाम पवित्रं परमं भवान् ।पुरुषं शाश्वतं दिव्यमादिदेवमजं विभुम् ॥ १२ ॥
slokas(no number): Arjuna said: You are the Supreme Absolute Truth, the Supreme Personality of Godhead, the Supreme Personality of Godhead, the eternal Supreme Personality of Godhead, the original Supreme Personality of Godhead.
slokas_english: Arjuna said: You are the Supreme Absolute Truth, the Supreme Personality of Godhead, the Supreme Personality of Godhead, the eternal Supreme Personality of Godhead, the original Supreme Personality of Godhead. 12 I have told you all the sages devarshi Nārada 13 ॥

slokas: आहुस्त्वामृषय: सर्वे देवर्षिर्नारदस्तथा ।असितो देवलो व्यास: स्वयं चैव ब्रवीषि मे ॥ १३ ॥
slokas(no number): I have told you all the sages devarshi Nārada

slokas: सर्वमेतदृतं मन्ये यन्मां वदसि केशव ।न हि ते भगवन्व्यक्तिं विदुर्देवा न दानवा: ॥ १४ ॥
slokas(no number): O Keśava, I think all this is true, O Keśava, for you are not known as the demigods, nor do the demigods, nor the demons.  ॥
slokas_english: O Keśava, I think all this is true, O Keśava, for you are not known as the demigods, nor do the demigods, nor the demons. 14 ॥

slokas: स्वयमेवात्मनात्मानं वेत्थ त्वं पुरुषोत्तम ।भूतभावन भूतेश देवदेव जगत्पते ॥ १५ ॥
slokas(no number): O Supreme Personality of Godhead, Lord of the universe, O Lord of the universe, You know Yourself, O Supreme Personality of Godhead.  ॥
slokas_english: O Supreme Personality of Godhead, Lord of the universe, O Lord of the universe, You know Yourself, O Supreme Personality of Godhead. 15 ॥

slokas: वक्तुमर्हस्यशेषेण दिव्या ह्यात्मविभूतय: ।याभिर्विभूतिभिर्लोकानिमांस्त्वं व्याप्य तिष्ठसि ॥ १६ ॥
slokas(no number): Please explain to me the entire universe with all the splendors of self-realized souls by which you pervade these worlds.  ॥
slokas_english: Please explain to me the entire universe with all the splendors of self-realized souls by which you pervade these worlds. 16 ॥

slokas: कथं विद्यामहं योगिंस्त्वां सदा परिचिन्तयन् ।केषु केषु च भावेषु चिन्त्योऽसि भगवन्मया ॥ १७ ॥
slokas(no number): O Lord, how can I meditate on You, who are always contemplating You, O Lord? You are to be contemplated by me, O Supreme Personality of Godhead. .
slokas_english: O Lord, how can I meditate on You, who are always contemplating You, O Lord? You are to be contemplated by me, O Supreme Personality of Godhead. 17.

slokas: विस्तरेणात्मनो योगं विभूतिं च जनार्दन ।भूय: कथय तृप्‍तिर्हि श‍ृण्वतो नास्ति मेऽमृतम् ॥ १८ ॥
slokas(no number): O Lord Janārdana, please explain to me more of myself in detail, for I am very much pleased with me.  ॥
slokas_english: O Lord Janārdana, please explain to me more of myself in detail, for I am very much pleased with me. 18 ॥

slokas: श्रीभगवानुवाचहन्त ते कथयिष्यामि दिव्या ह्यात्मविभूतय: ।प्राधान्यत: कुरुश्रेष्ठ नास्त्यन्तो विस्तरस्य मे ॥ १९ ॥
slokas(no number): O best of the Kurus, I shall now explain to you the divine opulences of my own self-realized souls. I shall now explain to you in detail. .
slokas_english: O best of the Kurus, I shall now explain to you the divine opulences of my own self-realized souls. I shall now explain to you in detail. 19.

slokas: अहमात्मा गुडाकेश सर्वभूताशयस्थित: ।अहमादिश्च मध्यं च भूतानामन्त एव च ॥ २० ॥
slokas(no number): O Gudakesha, I am the Self, and I am situated in the hearts of all living beings. I am the beginning, the middle and the end of all living entities.  ॥
slokas_english: O Gudakesha, I am the Self, and I am situated in the hearts of all living beings. I am the beginning, the middle and the end of all living entities. 20 ॥

slokas: आदित्यानामहं विष्णुर्ज्योतिषां रविरंश‍ुमान् ।मरीचिर्मरुतामस्मि नक्षत्राणामहं शशी ॥ २१ ॥
slokas(no number): Among the suns I am Lord Viṣṇu among the luminaries among the luminaries among the suns I am Marichi among the Maruts among the constellations I am the moon  ॥
slokas_english: Among the suns I am Lord Viṣṇu among the luminaries among the luminaries among the suns I am Marichi among the Maruts among the constellations I am the moon 21 ॥

slokas: वेदानां सामवेदोऽस्मि देवानामस्मि वासव: ।इन्द्रियाणां मनश्चास्मि भूतानामस्मि चेतना ॥ २२ ॥
slokas(no number): Among the Vedas I am the Sāma Veda among the demigods I am Vāsava among the senses I am the mind of the senses I am the consciousness of all living beings  ॥
slokas_english: Among the Vedas I am the Sāma Veda among the demigods I am Vāsava among the senses I am the mind of the senses I am the consciousness of all living beings 22 ॥

slokas: रुद्राणां शङ्करश्चास्मि वित्तेशो यक्षरक्षसाम् ।वसूनां पावकश्चास्मि मेरु: शिखरिणामहम् ॥ २३ ॥
slokas(no number): Among the Rudras I am Lord Śiva among the Rudras and among the Yakshas and Rākṣasas I am the fire among the Vasus and among the peaks I am the fire  ॥
slokas_english: Among the Rudras I am Lord Śiva among the Rudras and among the Yakshas and Rākṣasas I am the fire among the Vasus and among the peaks I am the fire 23 ॥

slokas: पुरोधसां च मुख्यं मां विद्धि पार्थ बृहस्पतिम् ।सेनानीनामहं स्कन्द: सरसामस्मि सागर: ॥ २४ ॥
slokas(no number): O son of Pṛthā, know Me as the chief among the priests, Bṛhaspati, among the armies I am Skanda, and I am the ocean of the lakes.  ॥
slokas_english: O son of Pṛthā, know Me as the chief among the priests, Bṛhaspati, among the armies I am Skanda, and I am the ocean of the lakes. 24 ॥

slokas: महर्षीणां भृगुरहं गिरामस्म्येकमक्षरम् ।यज्ञानां जपयज्ञोऽस्मि स्थावराणां हिमालय: ॥ २५ ॥
slokas(no number): I am Bhṛgu among the great sages, and I am the one syllable of the Supreme Personality of Godhead. .
slokas_english: I am Bhṛgu among the great sages, and I am the one syllable of the Supreme Personality of Godhead. 25.

slokas: अश्वत्थ: सर्ववृक्षाणां देवर्षीणां च नारद: ।गन्धर्वाणां चित्ररथ: सिद्धानां कपिलो मुनि: ॥ २६ ॥
slokas(no number): The sage Kapila was the son of Kītāratha among the Gandharvas, the gandharvas and the great sages of all the śiddhas. .
slokas_english: The sage Kapila was the son of Kītāratha among the Gandharvas, the gandharvas and the great sages of all the śiddhas. 26.

slokas: उच्‍चैःश्रवसमश्वानां विद्धि माममृतोद्भ‍वम् ।ऐरावतं गजेन्द्राणां नराणां च नराधिपम् ॥ २७ ॥
slokas(no number): Know Me to be the nectar of the horses of the horses and the king of the elephants and the king of men  ॥
slokas_english: Know Me to be the nectar of the horses of the horses and the king of the elephants and the king of men 27 ॥

slokas: आयुधानामहं वज्रं धेनूनामस्मि कामधुक् ।प्रजनश्चास्मि कन्दर्प: सर्पाणामस्मि वासुकि: ॥ २८ ॥
slokas(no number): Among the weapons I am the thunderbolt among the cows I am the milk of the desires I am the progenitor of the sons of Cupid and I am Vāsuki among the serpents .
slokas_english: Among the weapons I am the thunderbolt among the cows I am the milk of the desires I am the progenitor of the sons of Cupid and I am Vāsuki among the serpents 28.

slokas: अनन्तश्चास्मि नागानां वरुणो यादसामहम् ।पितॄणामर्यमा चास्मि यम: संयमतामहम् ॥ २९ ॥
slokas(no number): Among the forefathers I am Varuṇa among the serpents I am infinite among the serpents I am Yama among the forefathers I am Yama among the controllers .
slokas_english: Among the forefathers I am Varuṇa among the serpents I am infinite among the serpents I am Yama among the forefathers I am Yama among the controllers 29.

slokas: प्रह्लादश्चास्मि दैत्यानां काल: कलयतामहम् ।मृगाणां च मृगेन्द्रोऽहं वैनतेयश्च पक्षिणाम् ॥ ३० ॥
slokas(no number): I am Prahlāda among the demons, and among the mergers I am the deer among the deer. I am the lion among the birds. .
slokas_english: I am Prahlāda among the demons, and among the mergers I am the deer among the deer. I am the lion among the birds. 30.

slokas: पवन: पवतामस्मि राम: शस्त्रभृतामहम् ।झषाणां मकरश्चास्मि स्रोतसामस्मि जाह्नवी ॥ ३१ ॥
slokas(no number): Among the winds among the winds I am Rama among the bearers of weapons I am the crocodile among the fish I am the source of the streams I am the Jahnavi  ॥
slokas_english: Among the winds among the winds I am Rama among the bearers of weapons I am the crocodile among the fish I am the source of the streams I am the Jahnavi 31 ॥

slokas: सर्गाणामादिरन्तश्च मध्यं चैवाहमर्जुन ।अध्यात्मविद्या विद्यानां वाद: प्रवदतामहम् ॥ ३२ ॥
slokas(no number): O Arjuna I am the beginning and the end of all creations I am the knowledge of the spiritual knowledge among the learned  ॥
slokas_english: O Arjuna I am the beginning and the end of all creations I am the knowledge of the spiritual knowledge among the learned 32 ॥

slokas: अक्षराणामकारोऽस्मि द्वन्द्व: सामासिकस्य च ।अहमेवाक्षय: कालो धाताहं विश्वतोमुख: ॥ ३३ ॥
slokas(no number): I am the duality of the syllables of the syllables, and I am the infinitesimal time. .
slokas_english: I am the duality of the syllables of the syllables, and I am the infinitesimal time. 33.

slokas: मृत्यु: सर्वहरश्चाहमुद्भ‍वश्च भविष्यताम् ।कीर्ति: श्रीर्वाक्‍च नारीणां स्मृतिर्मेधा धृति: क्षमा ॥ ३४ ॥
slokas(no number): I am death, the destroyer of all, and I am the source of all knowledge.  ॥
slokas_english: I am death, the destroyer of all, and I am the source of all knowledge. 34 ॥

slokas: बृहत्साम तथा साम्न‍ां गायत्री छन्दसामहम् ।मासानां मार्गशीर्षोऽहमृतूनां कुसुमाकर: ॥ ३५ ॥
slokas(no number): The Gāyatrī Sāma and the Gāyatrī are the same as the Gāyatrī mantra, and the month of Margaśīrṣa is the month of Mārgaśīrṣa. .
slokas_english: The Gāyatrī Sāma and the Gāyatrī are the same as the Gāyatrī mantra, and the month of Margaśīrṣa is the month of Mārgaśīrṣa. 35.

slokas: द्यूतं छलयतामस्मि तेजस्तेजस्विनामहम् ।जयोऽस्मि व्यवसायोऽस्मि सत्त्वं सत्त्ववतामहम् ॥ ३६ ॥
slokas(no number): I am the effulgence of the effulgence of the effulgence of those who are deceived by the gambling I am the victory I am the determination I am the mode of goodness among the virtuous .
slokas_english: I am the effulgence of the effulgence of the effulgence of those who are deceived by the gambling I am the victory I am the determination I am the mode of goodness among the virtuous 36.

slokas: वृष्णीनां वासुदेवोऽस्मि पाण्डवानां धनञ्जय: ।मुनीनामप्यहं व्यास: कवीनामुशना कवि: ॥ ३७ ॥
slokas(no number): Among the Vṛṣṇis, I am Vāsudeva among the Pāṇḍavas, and among the sages among the sages I am Vyāsa, and among the poets I am Vyāsa. .
slokas_english: Among the Vṛṣṇis, I am Vāsudeva among the Pāṇḍavas, and among the sages among the sages I am Vyāsa, and among the poets I am Vyāsa. 37.

slokas: दण्डो दमयतामस्मि नीतिरस्मि जिगीषताम् ।मौनं चैवास्मि गुह्यानां ज्ञानं ज्ञानवतामहम् ॥ ३८ ॥
slokas(no number): I am punishment for those who control the punishment of those who desire to conquer among the secrets I am the knowledge of the secrets .
slokas_english: I am punishment for those who control the punishment of those who desire to conquer among the secrets I am the knowledge of the secrets 38.

slokas: यच्च‍ापि सर्वभूतानां बीजं तदहमर्जुन ।न तदस्ति विना यत्स्यान्मया भूतं चराचरम् ॥ ३९ ॥
slokas(no number): O Arjuna, I am the seed of all living entities, O Arjuna, and without Me, all moving and nonmoving beings exist. .
slokas_english: O Arjuna, I am the seed of all living entities, O Arjuna, and without Me, all moving and nonmoving beings exist. 39.

slokas: नान्तोऽस्ति मम दिव्यानां विभूतीनां परन्तप ।एष तूद्देशत: प्रोक्तो विभूतेर्विस्तरो मया ॥ ४० ॥
slokas(no number): O destroyer of enemies, I have described the details of the glories of the Supreme Personality of Godhead.  ॥
slokas_english: O destroyer of enemies, I have described the details of the glories of the Supreme Personality of Godhead. 40 ॥

slokas: यद्यद्विभूतिमत्सत्त्वं श्रीमदूर्जितमेव वा ।तत्तदेवावगच्छ त्वं मम तेजोऽशसम्भवम् ॥ ४१ ॥
slokas(no number): Please understand that whatever is glorious or opulent or powerful is born of My effulgence. .
slokas_english: Please understand that whatever is glorious or opulent or powerful is born of My effulgence. 41.

slokas: अथवा बहुनैतेन किं ज्ञातेन तवार्जुन ।विष्टभ्याहमिदं कृत्स्नमेकांशेन स्थितो जगत् ॥ ४२ ॥
slokas(no number): Or else, O Arjuna, what is the use of this great thing? I am sitting in the entire universe with one part of the universe.  ॥
slokas_english: Or else, O Arjuna, what is the use of this great thing? I am sitting in the entire universe with one part of the universe. 42 ॥
